Clear World._current:
Once per turn, during your End Phase, pay 500 LP or DESTROY this card.
Each player receives effects, depending on the monster Attributes they control.
● LIGHT: Play with your hand revealed at all times.
● DARK: If you control 2 or more monsters, you cannot declare an attack.
● EARTH: During your Standby Phase, DESTROY 1 face-up Defense Position monster you control.
● WATER: During your End Phase, DISCARD 1 card.
● FIRE: During your End Phase, take 1000 damage.
● WIND: You must pay 500 LP to activate a Spell Card.
